passages.text:
It’s after 10 PM and Senior Constable Ash Bowden is on to an unusual job.

[[ashintro1]]
passages.name: intro

passages.text:
What happened mate?

[[I’m just waiting for a mate.->ash2]]
[[I wondering the same mate.->ash2-1]]

links.name: I’m just waiting for a mate.

passages.name: ash1

passages.text:
Is that why your cars all smashed up and you’re up on the grass at the moment or what?

[[Yeah… just waiting for a mate he’s gone in… in there. Why?->ash3]]
[[Uhh?->ash3-1]]

links.name: Yeah… just waiting for a mate he’s gone in… in there. Why?

passages.name: ash2

passages.text:
I’m just wondering hh-h-how the collision with the car happened mate?

[[A wasp flew right in m'face and I span out mate.->gameover1]]
[[What collision?->ash4]]

links.name: A wasp flew right in m'face and I span out mate.

passages.name: ash3

passages.text:
Well the one that’s got your, all your wheels and stuff twist up, your front bumper bars hanging off mate.

[[Well... I’m just waiting for a mate, as i said.->ash5]]

links.name: Well... I’m just waiting for a mate, as i said.

passages.name: ash4

passages.text:
Who’s your mate?

[[James, he’s in there.->ash6]]
[[Martin, he’s went to find some food->ash6-1]]

links.name: Martin, he’s went to find some food

passages.name: ash5

passages.text:
How’d you get down here?

[[Does it matter?->ash7]]
passages.name: ash6

passages.text:
It kinda does mate cause you’ve just been involved in an accident.

[[No I havent!->ash8]]
[[I'll be honest, I have but it's me birthday.->win]]

links.name: I'll be honest, I have but it's me birthday.

passages.name: ash7

passages.text:
Lying to an officer of the law is a criminal offense...

[[gameover1]]
passages.name: ash8

passages.text:
Just up in Carrum Downs we’re looking for a car that was doing burnouts and then another calls come through saying that ummm ...

[[ashintro2]]
passages.name: ashintro1

passages.text:
Witness to the incident have given the location of this shopping mall car park. Ash soon spots what he’s looking for.

[[ash1]]
passages.name: intro2

passages.text:
... a similar looking car or very similar description has crashed. So we’re just trying to get to it as quick as we can to see what the hell is going on.

[[intro2]]
passages.name: ashintro2

passages.text:
Your mate the one driving?

[[...I'm just waiting for him.->ash3]]
passages.name: ash3-1

passages.text:
Food? You got peckish after all this eh?

[[Just hungry aint I->gameover1-hungry]]
passages.name: ash6-1

passages.text:
The driver was fined $600 and sentenced to four months community service. His license was disqualified for three years.

[[Start again->intro]]
passages.name: gameover2

passages.text:
Ok, well I'm taking you in. No one should be that hungry after a collision.

[[gameover2]]
passages.name: gameover1-hungry

passages.text:
Is this your car?

[[Yes mate, I crashed officer.->gameover1]]
[[I'm a private investigator. I'm investigating.->win]]

links.name: I'm a private investigator. I'm investigating.

passages.name: ash2-1

passages.text:
Going to have to take you in then mate.

[[gameover2]]
passages.name: gameover1

passages.text:
Well I'll let you get on with it then. Sorry for the bother!

[[Start again->intro]]
passages.name: win
